page.title: 02MANOR COTTAGE BUNNY
page.content: My name is Adam Sewell. I live at Manor Cottage,12 Moor Lane,Bunny. Our cottage is about 300 years old. It is built with stone foundations and brick made in Bunny. Every morning in winter my Dad lights a fire in the sitting room and in the dining room. When I get up I go into the kitchen and make our breakfast. If I drop a bowl it would smash on the quarry tiles. The stairs are very steep, there are only nine stairs to the top. We have small sliding sash windows so they are easy to clean. My bedroom is in the eaves. Before each door is a step as all the rooms are on different levels. The latch doors have ancient hinges. In the sitting room there is a low beam. My Dad has to duck to get under it. The dairy has an old brick thrall or shelf for cooling dairy produce. Our house is full of antiques.
